definitions.definition: A person who has been hired , especially in a cohort .
examples: We pair up each of our new hires with one of our original hires .

definitions.definition: The state of being hired, or having a job ; employment .
examples: When my grandfather retired, he had over twenty mechanics in his hire .

definitions.definition: Payment for the temporary use of something.
examples: The sign offered pedalos on hire .

main_definition: ( countable ) A person who has been hired , especially in a cohort .
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) The state of being hired, or having a job ; employment .
( uncountable ) Payment for the temporary use of something.
